fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Food Safety, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Follow-up of EU legislation related to transportation and smart mobility, plus promotion of the involvement of the firm's clients in EU-funded programs, specially in H2020 calls.
goals__remit:
S3Transportation (Smart, Safe and Sustainable Transportation) is a global consultancy firm specialized in Transport Engineering & Economics and Transport Innovation. 
​ 
Based in London (United Kingdom), the firm represents the merger of two consultancy companies and brings together a senior partnership active in the transportation area since 1986. 
 
Our references:  
+260 projects 
+70 clients 
+55 countries
customers: EUROPEA DE FORMACION Y CONSULTORIA# SMART SAFE & SUSTAINABLE BOLIVIA LTDA# TRANSPORT & INFRASTRUCTURE EXPERTISE GROUP# PROYECTO DE TRANSPORTE URBANO PARA AREAS METROPOLITANAS (PTUMA)# AUTORIDAD PORTUARIA DE SEVILLA
position: Senior Partner & Head of Transport Innovation
